SUMMARY: Are you ready to launch your career in IT with a company that's transforming healthcare through innovation, collaboration, and a commitment to excellence? At bioLytical Laboratories, we're passionate about making a difference-and we're looking for an IT Intern who shares our drive to learn, grow, and contribute. As a Junior IT Analyst at bioLytical, you'll experience the full spectrum of IT operations in a fast-paced, collaborative environment. This is a generalist role-you'll gain exposure to a variety of tasks and projects, including scripting, database and application support, and infrastructure & IT support. HOW YOU WILL CONTRIBUTE: • Assist with basic scripting to streamline workflows and automate routine tasks. • Provide first-level support for internal applications, helping users troubleshoot and resolve issues. • Help maintain and monitor our IT infrastructure, including hardware, software, and network systems. • Assist with administration for all systems and software applications • Contribute as a team member within the IT group to support our end users • Perform application updates consistent with best practices and established procedures. Job Requirements WHAT YOU BRING: • Enrolled in or recently completed a post-secondary program in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. • Familiarity with scripting languages (e.g., C#, VBScript), SQL database operations, basic troubleshooting, and IT support principles. • Experience working with Salesforce and Salesforce hosted applications will be an asset • Collaborative spirit and willingness to support others. • Proactive approach to problem-solving and a desire to take on new challenges. • Ability to manage multiple tasks and prioritize effectively. • Ability to learn applications and processes quickly, while adapting to change WHAT WE OFFER: • Mentorship & Growth: Work alongside experienced IT professionals who are committed to your development. • Impactful Work: Contribute to projects that support our mission to deliver rapid diagnostic solutions globally. • Real-World Experience: Gain hands-on exposure to a wide range of IT functions, preparing you for future roles in technology.
